relevance_explanation: The routine is mostly relevant. Step 1 retains "Inform the customer of their account type" which is redundant since the account type is already presented. Also, error handling is retained which could be pruned since there is no reason to believe any step would fail. These are minor.
completeness_explanation: All required logic for this customer is preserved. The routine includes address validation, update, applying the address hold, and completing the case, as needed for a standard client changing their address.
